data.title: Rick and Morty Season 7 cast guide: Unveiling the voices behind beloved characters
data.meta_description: As "Rick and Morty" Season 7 unfolds, fans can look forward to an exciting blend of new and returning voices, ensuring the continued vibrancy and entertainment that this animated series has delivered for seven remarkable seasons.
data.text:
Synopsis

As "Rick and Morty" Season 7 unfolds, fans can look forward to an exciting blend of new and returning voices, ensuring the continued vibrancy and entertainment that this animated series has delivered for seven remarkable seasons.

As the ever-popular adult animated series "Rick and Morty" graces our screens with its seventh season, fans eagerly anticipate not only the unfolding adventures but also the vocal talents that bring their beloved characters to life. With Season 7's recent release on October 15, we dive into the world of voice acting, exploring the new and returning cast members of this iconic show.

Rick and Morty's Intriguing Season 7 Premise

While Season 7 is shrouded in mystery, the Season 6 finale dropped tantalizing hints about the overarching theme and storyline for the upcoming season. Rick's revelation about his dark backstory and quest for vengeance against the elusive Rick Prime sets the stage for a season of intrigue, exploration, and, of course, chaos.

The Current Cast

The revamped cast for Season 7 now includes a lineup of talented actors who will take over the roles of Rick, Morty, and the other beloved characters.

Ian Cardoni as Rick Sanchez: Rick, the brilliant yet deeply flawed scientist, has now found a new voice in Ian Cardoni. His transition into this iconic character has been smooth, allowing Rick Sanchez to retain his distinctive personality.

Harry Belden as Morty Smith: Morty, Rick's ever-reluctant grandson, embarks on bizarre adventures alongside his grandfather. With Harry Belden now stepping into this role, Morty's character maintains its authenticity.

Chris Parnell as Jerry Smith: Jerry, the neurotic and often bumbling father of Morty, continues to be portrayed by Chris Parnell. His portrayal of Jerry has been consistent across all seven seasons.

Spencer Grammer as Summer Smith: Summer, Morty's sister, is brought to life by Spencer Grammer. Her character retains the unique traits that have endeared her to fans.

Sarah Chalke as Beth Smith and Space Beth: Sarah Chalke takes on the roles of both Beth and Space Beth, the matriarch of the Smith family and her mysterious counterpart. Her multifaceted performance enriches the show's narrative.

Keith David as President Curtis: President Curtis, a recurring character in the series, is portrayed by Keith David. His deep and distinctive voice has left a memorable impression on fans.

Additional Cast Members

"Rick and Morty" Season 7 also features a host of other characters voiced by talented actors, including:

Kari Wahlgren as Space Cruiser

Phil Hendrie as Principal Gene Vagina

Tom Kenny as Squanchy and Gene

Dan Harmon as Birdperson

Scott Chernoff as Gearhead

Hugh Jackman as Himself

And Other Cast Members

The diverse range of voices and performances by these actors adds depth and dimension to the show's rich tapestry of characters.

FAQs

How old is Rick and Morty season 7?

"Rick and Morty" returns with its seventh season, offering fans 10 fresh episodes of the adult animated series that follows the escapades of the brilliant but eccentric scientist Rick Sanchez and his 14-year-old grandson Morty Smith. The show is back on Adult Swim.

Who replaced Justin Roiland as Rick in season 7?

"Rick and Morty" has now disclosed the new voice actors who have taken over for Justin Roiland, the former star who was removed from the popular animated series following allegations of domestic violence. Ian Cardoni now voices Rick Sanchez, while Harry Belden assumes the role of Morty Smith.
